subject: Unable to order the simson plus x pedals
description_text:
Hi team,
I am trying to order the simsonn plus x pedals but when i click the
checkout button the paper just keeps loading and then after 1-2 minutes of
constant loading it gives an error that "This site can't be reached" for
some shop.app website. I need these pedals ASAP. I am from India. I need to
get these pedals ASAP because i have to travel and won't be in india.
Please help me get these pedals, will appreciate your support.
Thanks
Mustufa Asher

conversations.body_text: Hi Mustufa Asher,    Being able to proceed to checkout indicates the website is functioning properly. If you're unable to complete the transaction, it may be due to payment environment issues or network connectivity problems. You can try switching to a different browser to complete the checkout. We have some Indian customers who are able to make payments normally. You may want to try another browser or alternative payment method.

Hi, I tried different network, browser and all but still i get the shop.app
took too long to respond error message, also lets say if we do get to order
then what about the custom duties, they are like 30-40% here in india

On Sat, Nov 8, 2025 at 10:05 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi team, The checkout started working today and i am planning to order, but
what if the product gets stuck at customs or if they demand too much custom
duty and I dont accept and return the product, will i be able to get
a refund? BTW thanks for fixing the checkout issue, your support is
amazing, kudos to you all.

On Sat, Nov 8, 2025 at 10:05 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi, Mustufa Asher      Shipping to India may indeed involve customs duties. We can declare the goods at a lower value for you, but you will be responsible for paying the duties. Alternatively, you can inform me of the declared value you prefer.

Hi, thanks a lot for your reply, I am willing to order the pedals and I
like your idea of lowering the price on the invoice. Honestly this is my
first time buying something from a different country so I don't know at all
what are the custom duties, how are they calculated, if they are 10%, 30%,
50%, 100% or whatever. You all are really experienced shipping to
different countries and i was checking the reviews for simsonn and there
were comments mentioning how great the customer support of simsonn is,
these comments made me discard simnet pedals from my list if you know about
them (their srp pro deals are your plus x pedals direct competitors).

So my request is that you know the custom charges and all and you know what
will be a reasonable lower value to declare, you know all this 100x better
than me, I tried searching but wasn't able to understand, so I request if
you can give me an assurance or some number that this is the total amount
you will have to pay to the custom department, and if it is more than that
so I can return the pedals and don't accept the delivery and get a refund
or maybe if it's a bit more then I can pay it or if you provide an
assurance that if it is more than that you can manage it.

I am really sorry to ask for such way but this is my first time importing
something and I am very scared about it's handling and all, I know it
doesn't affect you if I don't buy, you have a ton of customers but if you
can help me with this it will just be a huge help for me and I just don't
know what to say. Hope you understand please.

Thanks a lot

On Mon, Nov 10, 2025, 9:10 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Mustufa Asher,    If we declare the value as $59, customs duties during Indian clearance will typically be around ₹1,500 (under $20) in most cases and rarely exceed this amount.  Even if customs in certain regions assess based on a higher valuation, duties generally won't exceed ₹2,000–₹2,200 ($25).

Hi team, thanks for the lovely response.
If the custom duties are 2k-5k I have no issue paying them, just if they
don't re-asses the value, would you please allow me to return and refund
the product if they ask for much more than 5k or if you can help with
custom only if it is more than that, I don't know what I can do for you, I
have good reach on reddit and I can surely make posts daily about simsonn
pedals there for sometime, some of my posts get 10-20k views and good
engagement. Thanks again for the quick response

On Tue, Nov 11, 2025, 5:36 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Mustufa Asher,    If the amount exceeds this figure, we promise to cover the additional portion for you. Please don't worry.

Hi, oh my god thanks a lot, let's order these pedals, I will definitely say
you have the best customer support, should i order directly from website
and share the order id with you? I can pay $30 custom duty from my side. I
plan to select express shipping. Once again thanks a lot.

On Tue, Nov 11, 2025 at 4:21 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi team, as you have the best support I have ever seen honestly, I posted
about your plus x pedals on reddit and as expected the post started getting
viral because my account is almost 3 years old and I have good karma score
on reddit, it got almost 300 views and a comment and I posted it just 8
minutes ago. I have thought to post about them for a few days daily, I just
added an image of them, do you send free samples for marketing, I'd love to
make a video with me speaking about them and I'll keep posting it on
reddit, you are really missing on reddit, I have sold a lot of services on
reddit worth over 10k usd till now so I am really good at reddit marketing.
I will make a video with my own voice and post it on reddit if I have them,
hope you will send it and I can also share the reddit posts link if you
want (my id is giveawayguy786) please send me marketing samples and I'd
love to promote on different platforms mainly on reddit as I have really
good, trusted and old account in there

PS: till I wrote this much the views have now crossed 500, it's literally
viral, many views coming in per second.

Thanks a lot

On Tue, Nov 11, 2025, 4:21 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi team, as you have the best support I have ever seen honestly, I posted
about your plus x pedals on reddit and as expected the post started getting
viral because my account is almost 3 years old and I have good karma score
on reddit, it got almost 300 views and a comment and I posted it just 8
minutes ago. I have thought to post about them for a few days daily, I just
added an image of them, do you send free samples for marketing, I'd love to
make a video with me speaking about them and I'll keep posting it on
reddit, you are really missing on reddit, I have sold a lot of services on
reddit worth over 10k usd till now so I am really good at reddit marketing.
I will make a video with my own voice and post it on reddit if I have them,
hope you will send it and I can also share the reddit posts link if you
want (my id is giveawayguy786) please send me marketing samples and I'd
love to promote on different platforms mainly on reddit as I have really
good, trusted and old account in there

PS: till I wrote this much the views have now crossed 500, it's literally
viral, many views coming in per second.

Thanks a lot

On Tue, Nov 11, 2025, 4:21 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi, update on the post i made on reddit, it's getting almost 6 views per
second, here is the post link
https://www.reddit.com/r/simracing/s/r46y8gl7v6

Hope you will send me a marketing sample for the pedals and I will make
videos and post on reddit daily for some days

Thanks for the great support so far

On Tue, Nov 11, 2025, 4:21 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi team, another quick update, the post about simsonn pedals have almost
hit 6k views already and have a lot of upvotes, comments and shares. If you
can send me marketing samples i can make a review video and post it there
daily for sometime, it surely can bring in a lot of customers for you.
hope you will send me samples after seeing such amazing results.
thanks a lot for the superb support so far, looking forward for your
message. thanks

On Tue, Nov 11, 2025, 4:21 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi team, another update, the most has hit 36k views, congrats!!




On Tue, Nov 11, 2025, 4:21 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Mustufa Asher,    Thank you for your kind words and promotion! You can place your order with confidence—we'll cover any customs fees exceeding $30, please don't worry.

Hi, would you please send me a marketing sample for free, the post have now
reached 62.6k views, I will post a video review on reddit with a buy link
if you send me the sample, my reddit account is very old and I have really
good karma score, please let me know, i will do my possible best and make
as many posts and videos on reddit as possible
Thanks





On Wed, Nov 12, 2025, 11:32 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi, I got you a sale, the reddit post has crossed 63k views and a lot of
comments where people are talking about your pedals and discussing about
their performance, I have attached the screenshot of a person who commented
he is buying the pedals because of me, i think I can do much more if you
can send me the pro x or plus x pedals for review, the marketing sample for
free, hope you will send them and I can make review and answer all the
people in comment section and post more review video




On Wed, Nov 12, 2025, 11:32 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi, I've got you atleast 3 sales so far, congrats, people are asking for my
review and what I think, but I don't have the pedals, if you please send me
a free review samples i will surely answer all these people who just want
to buy it, see the screenshot please, they say my post made their mind of
buying these





On Wed, Nov 12, 2025, 11:32 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Mustufa Asher,    Thank you very much for your assistance, but we are unable to provide free samples due to the high cost of the products and the logistics expenses involved in shipping to India. We can offer you a special 15% discount and hope you will accept this proposal.

Hi, i understand, can you please provide a $100-150 voucher atleast, would
love to make more posts for you

On Wed, Nov 12, 2025, 3:20 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Mustufa Asher,    Sorry, the 15% exclusive discount is the best offer we can provide.  You can register for our Affiliate Program to earn commissions: https://www.simsonn.com/pages/affiliate-program

Hi, ok please tell me how to get that 15%

On Wed, Nov 12, 2025, 3:32 PM support@simsonn.com

I am using that black45 coupon already so how will i get this 15% without
having to remove the black45, can you please help with this?

On Wed, Nov 12, 2025 at 3:32 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Mustufa Asher,      You can use this discount code: Asher15  Additionally, discounts cannot be combined. Sorry about that.

Hi, this coupon is just giving $37 discount whereas black45 is giving $45
discount, as you said that you are giving 15% exclusive discount for me so
would you please make a coupon that provides $82 discount (45 default for
all users + 15% i.e. 37 exclusive for me)

My order total is $247 so a 33% coupon will get this covered and its not
extra, its just $45 which all users get + 15% what you said to give to me.
Instead of a 33% coupon you can also make it $82 flat coupon if the
software allows

Sorry for disturbing you too much
Thanks

On Wed, Nov 12, 2025 at 3:56 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Mustufa Asher,    We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Unfortunately, we are unable to offer a larger discount. You may use the code: Asher50 to enjoy $50 off your $199 purchase.

Ok thanks, btw what will be the discount in black friday sale if it
currently is $45

On Wed, Nov 12, 2025 at 4:20 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Mustufa Asher,    Black Friday discounts will remain the same; we're just starting the presale early.

Hi, thanks for the response.
Actually my phone broke yesterday so I will have to get a new one, sadly I
won't be able to afford the simpson pedals now, i absolutely love them but
I just cannot buy them.
Can you please tell me a number of views you want, after which you can send
me the pedals for free as marketing samples, I have already brought you 77k
views, please give me a number, 100k, 150k or how many? I will post
daily till I get the number of views which you want to send the marketing
samples. I have seen you sending the samples to people with 3k
subscribers who bring in 20-30k views on the videos max, thats why I just
feel that. I will pay for the shipping. Please tell me a number of views
which you want in 100s of thousands and I will do my possible best to bring
in views as well as sales which you obviously got from these 77k views
also. I think I have got you the most views so far compared to any
influencer, even OC racing got 77k views and me too, so hope you get my
feeling. I really appreciate your support and everything, I'll still say
you have the best support I have ever seen. I hope you will see and then
provide me with the number of views you want, no influencer was able to
exceed 77k views till now for you.
Thanks a lot

On Wed, Nov 12, 2025 at 4:47 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Mustufa Asher,    Thank you for your kind words and recognition. However, sample shipments are subject to specific requirements and must undergo approval. We will evaluate the collaborator's follower base, channel content, and follower engagement levels. We appreciate your understanding.

Hi, I totally understand that, I won't ask for the sample shipments, but
for the 86.5k views on my post about simsonn pedals (and 3 confirmed sales,
might be many more) which is the highest anyone has got you till now,
second highest are of oc racing channel whose video has 78k views and they
got a free sample shipment, I just naturally expect atleast $150 coupon if
oc racing received $450 pedals for 78k views, a $150-200 simsonn coupon
(not a cash prize just discount on your product) can make my week, I just
love your pedals really much and I want to get them buy right now I can't
afford them. I have attached the views screenshot below of both my post
views and oc racing views as well and also screenshot of people saying they
are buying it because of my post. Hope you will understand and give me a
$150-200 discount on your pedals please (not a cash prize)
Thanks a lot



On Thu, Nov 13, 2025, 1:22 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi, do you have any questions for me?

Hi Mustufa Asher,    I apologize for the delayed response. I did submit this for approval to our manager, but such a significant discount cannot be approved. The traffic from Riddit does not translate into conversions for us, and shipping from India carries high tax risks. I hope you understand! You can still use the $50 discount code we provided to you at any time.

Hi, thanks for the reply, please let me know as your manager replies, I
hope it's something positive, atleast close to $100.
Thanks & Regards

On Fri, Nov 14, 2025, 1:22 PM support@simsonn.com
